overview: Before the era of the Laser Men resistance, an ambitious warrior with the help of his partners, look to make an innovative difference with the weapons they have been using in the years-long ongoing fight against the mercenaries who have taken over their home land. All throughout this journey, his character and motives are tested by family difficulties, power trips and team loyalty.
tagline: Sometimes you're ready for the future, but it's not ready for you.
title: The Gunner
